description: Defines the maximum vertical build limit for all generated structures.

rules.name: GlobalHeightCeiling
rules.constraint: for each shape in model.shapes, shape.position.y must be <= 50

rules.name: AtmosphericPressureIntegrity
rules.constraint: if shape.material is 'glass' and shape.position.y > 40, require reinforced variant
rules.notes: Standard glass is not suitable for high-altitude pressures in this simulation.
